meanings.definition: A person who campaigns to bring about political or social change.
meanings.sent1: The activists organized a peaceful protest to advocate for better education.
meanings.sent2: Many activists marched in the streets to demand equal rights for all.
meanings.sent3: The activists decided to host a bake sale to raise awareness about climate change.
meanings.sent4: The activists' voices echoed through the city, calling for justice.
meanings.sent5: The image of the activists holding hands in unity left a lasting impression on the community.

meanings.definition: A person who takes direct action to achieve a political or social goal.
meanings.sent1: The activists bravely chained themselves to the trees to protect the forest.
meanings.sent2: Some activists went on a hunger strike to protest against government corruption.
meanings.sent3: The activists dressed up as superheroes to bring laughter to the children's hospital.
meanings.sent4: The activists' determination was a beacon of hope in the fight for equality.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the activists standing up against injustice will never fade.
